snippet: A judge struck down a state law requiring doctors to follow label instructions when prescribing abortion-inducing drugs.
abstract: Oklahoma Judge Patricia Parrish strikes down state law requiring doctors to adhere to label instructions when prescribing abortion-inducing drugs; opponents of law argue that it forces doctors to follow outdated and less safe methods.
lead_paragraph: A judge struck down a state law requiring doctors to follow label instructions when prescribing abortion-inducing drugs.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Judge Calls Curbs on Abortion Drugs Unconstitutional
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Judge Calls Curbs on Abortion Drugs Unconstitutional
